name: Hard Time Mod
description:
Hard Time is a game created by video game developer Mat Dickie. The first sentence can be anywhere from 51-99 days, but good or bad behavior throughout the game can shorten or extend your sentence. The primary objective is to survive the entire prison term and to be free to the outside world. 

This project is free or donation meaning you may dowload it for free but we do accept donations, we would really appriciate the people that donate and take the time to try our mods.
